title: Annual Sports Day
description: Join us for a day of thrilling athletic competitions, team spirit, and fun-filled activities. A celebration of sportsmanship and talent.

title: Science and Technology Expo
description: Explore the innovative projects and scientific discoveries made by our students. A showcase of creativity and critical thinking.

title: Charity Bake Sale
description: Support a good cause while enjoying delicious treats baked by our students and staff. All proceeds will go to a local charity.
